类 Deer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animal
      • Deer
  • public class Deer
extends Animal
    A simple model of a Deer. Deers age, move, breed, and die.
    版本:
    2016.02.29 (2)
    作者:
    David J. Barnes and Michael Kölling

      Create a new Deer.

      This is what the Deer does most of the time - it runs around.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Deer

        public Deer​(boolean randomAge,
            Field field,
            Location location)
        Create a new Deer. A Deer may be created with age zero (a new born) or with a random age.
        参数:
        randomAge - If true, the Deer will have a random age.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.

    • 方法详细资料

      • act

        public void act​(java.util.List<Animal> newDeers)
        This is what the Deer does most of the time - it runs around. Sometimes it will breed or die of old age.
        指定者:
        act 在类中 Animal
        参数:
        newDeers - A list to return newly born Deers.
